Title: Relates to the appointment of election inspectors and poll clerks
Summary: Relates to the appointment of election inspectors and poll clerks; provides that each board of elections submit a report detailing assignments of election inspectors and poll clerks; provides that each board of elections be required to fill vacancies by appointing individuals that appear on the additional inspector list.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the appointment of election inspectors and poll clerks
